Question.Subject: out of carnival, royal caribbean, and norweigan (cruises) which is the best and why?

ChosenAnswer: I prefer Royal Caribbean out of all these. There is so much to do onboard. The new NCL Epic does sound amazing, although I haven't sailed on her yet.

Answers.Answer: Of THESE three, it's a toss-up between Royal and Carnival. NCL is a notch below either, in terms of quality and service.
